list-item.title: Apartment in Panthea
list-item.description: This spacious apartment for rent in the sought-after Panthea suburb offers a comfortable and modern living experience. Located on the second floor of a three-story building with elevator access, this key-ready home spans 145 mÂ² of internal space. The apartment features three bright bedrooms, a studio in the ground floor, two stylish bathrooms, and an open-plan living and dining area that flows onto a private balcony. Residents can enjoy panoramic views of the city, the mountains, and even the sea, creating a scenic backdrop from every window. Panthea is known for its peaceful environment and affluent feel, making it popular with families and professionals alike. The area is well-connected, offering easy access to the highway for quick trips into the city while remaining close to international schools, parks, and local amenities. This gated complex provides added security and a sense of community. Energy efficiency A means you benefit from lower bills and a greener lifestyle. The apartment is offered optionally furnished, allowing you to move in with ease or bring your own personal touch. The apartment can be offered fully furnished for 3300eur.
